thumb.title: UR COOKED!! [CRYSTALLIZED] - Pomegranola, drpdmr (Synthesizer V Eri & Synthesizer V Yuma)
thumb.description: ➤ DON'T CARE ABOUT NO 'A POINT'!Pome: "This one was a long time coming. drpdmr and I have been working on this since last June and so many people were involved in making this happen. Everyone chef'ed up, and drpdmr added his flare to the song and vocals in this collab."➤ CREDITS クレジット─ PRODUCTION/MIX/MASTER 楽曲 : Pomegranola https://x.com/pomegranola─ SONGWRITING/VOCALS 歌詞・歌 : Pomegranola https://x.com/pomegranola drpdmr https://x.com/drpdmr─ ILLUST イラスト : 九藤咲織 (Saori Kudou) https://x.com/Saori_Kudou_─ SONG LOGO ロゴ : Nutnut https://x.com/NutnutYe─ SYNTH V TUNING 調声 : Denev https://x.com/esan223─ GUITAR SOLO/ELECTRIC BASS ギター・ベース : Younger Bro─ ART PUPPETING イラスト動き : Dan https://x.com/Dan_drage1─ MOVIE 映像 : Amilim and Reisth https://x.com/AmilimandReisth─ ALBUM COVER アルバムデザイン : kateellec https://x.com/kateellec➤ LINKS─ STREAMING LINK ストリーミング : https://distrokid.com/hyperfollow/pomegranolaanddrpdmr/ur-cooked─ INST 絆創 : https://drive.google.com/file/d/1zwWDl2XnL5gh-lQ3Vbz4iYe0dmpi_UyJ/view?usp=sharing─ LYRICS 歌詞 : https://docs.google.com/document/d/17RRSbfl9zyWXraMjBFtgG4AcgrHHMNQh76z4X3Ng6fU/edit?usp=sharing
